Package SEURAT.editors

This package implements SEURAT's rationale editors using the Eclipse editor framework.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
AlternativeEditor This class provides the editor for alternatives.
AlternativeEditor.Input Wraps an alternative into a logical file.
ArgumentEditor  
ArgumentEditor.Input Wraps an argument into a logical file.
CandidateRationaleEditor This class provides the editor for CandidateRationales.
CandidateRationaleEditor.Input Wraps an CandidateRationale into a logical file.
CandidateRationaleEditorBase The base class for the new SEURAT rationale editors.
CandidateRationaleEditorInput The base class for the input of the new SEURAT rationale editors.
DecisionEditor  
DecisionEditor.Input Wraps a decision into a logical file
OpenCandidateRationaleEditorAction Class For Automating The Process Of Opening A SEURAT Rationale Editor Window Using The Eclipse Editor Framework Extension Point.
OpenRationaleEditorAction Class For Automating The Process Of Opening A SEURAT Rationale Editor Window Using The Eclipse Editor Framework Extension Point.
PatternDecisionEditor Displays the editor for a decision in pattern library.
PatternDecisionEditor.Input Wraps a decision into a logical file
PatternEditor This is the workbench editor of Patterns.
PatternEditor.Input  
QuestionEditor Edit a tradeoff or co-occurrence.
QuestionEditor.Input Wrap a question in a logical file
RationaleEditorBase The base class for the new SEURAT rationale editors.
RationaleEditorInput The base class for the input of the new SEURAT rationale editors.
RequirementEditor Requirement editor.
RequirementEditor.Input Wrap a requirement in a logical file.
TradeoffEditor Edit a tradeoff or co-occurrence.
TradeoffEditor.Input Wrap a tradeoff into a logical file
 

Package SEURAT.editors Description

This package implements SEURAT's rationale editors using the Eclipse editor framework.
